Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

title: Hello World

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

W3C 5 4 4 > 4. ## ### HTML ![image](/img/20230711021718.png) ------- HTML ![image](/img/20230711021839.png) ------- #### ** HTML** ![image](/img/20230711022045.png) CSS CSS JS JS HTML CSS JS ![image](/imhg/20230711022147.png) cssjs ![image](/img/20230711022309.png) `link` CSS HTML CSS CSS HTML `script` HTML JS HTML JS DOM DOM JS HTML DOM CSSOM CSSOM ------- #### **** ![image](/img/20230711022430.png) DOM Computed Style `red``rgb(255,0,0)``em``px` DOM -------- #### **** ![image](/img/20230711022532.png) DOM DOM ![image](/img/20230711022631.png) `display:none` DOM DOM ![image](/img/20230711022723.png) ----------- #### **** ![image](/img/20230711022759.png) transformopacity `will-change` --------- #### **** ![image](/img/20230711022913.png) ------ #### **** ![image](/img/20230711023058.png) ![image](/img/20230711023204.png) ---- #### **** ![image](/img/20230711023306.png) GPU GPU ![image](/img/20230711023306.png) --------- #### **** ![image](/img/20230711023453.png) quad `transform` quad GPU GPU GPU #### **** ![image](/img/20230711023600.png) ### reflow reflow layout layout JS reflow JS reflow ### repaint repaint repaint reflow repaint ### transform transform draw draw transform transform ## CSS >**csscss** CSS border-box content-box CSS **containing block** CSS CSS *https://drafts.csswg.org/css2/#containing-block-details* ** width, height, padding, margin position absolute fixed** case ```html
``` ```css .container{ width: 500px; height: 300px; background-color: skyblue; } .item{ width: 50%; height: 50%; background-color: red; } ``` div.item div.item width 250pxheight 150px div.container width 500px50% 250pxheight 300px 50% 150px **div.item ** **** HTML **initial containing block** viewport - positiion relative static block containercontent area - position fixed - absolute position static fixedabsoluterelative sticky ```html
``` ```css .container { width: 500px; height: 300px; background-color: skyblue; position: relative; } .item { width: 300px; height: 150px; border: 5px solid; margin-left: 100px; } .item2 { width: 100px; height: 100px; background-color: red; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 10px; } ``` div.item2 div.container div.item 80% position absolute fixed - transform perspective none - will-change transform perspective - filter none will-change filter( Firefox ). - contain paint (: contain: paint;) ```html
``` ```css .container { width: 500px; height: 300px; background-color: skyblue; position: relative; } .item { width: 300px; height: 150px; border: 5px solid; margin-left: 100px; transform: rotate(0deg); /* */ } .item2 { width: 100px; height: 100px; background-color: red; position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 10px; } ``` transform: rotate(0deg) div.item2 div.item CSS ```html Illustration of containing blocks

This is text in the second paragraph.

(UA-dependent) | | body | html | | div1 | initial C.B.
